required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Single-dose/Multiple-doses Incremental Intravenous Injection of SY-005 in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate Safety, Tolerance and Pharmacokinetics of SY-005 After Single-dose/Multiple-doses Incremental Intravenous Injection in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Suzhou Yabao Pharmaceutical R&D Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Suzhou Yabao Pharmaceutical R&D Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single-dose/multiple-doses incremental, randomized, double-blind, parallel, placebo-controlled study on safety, tolerance and pharmacokinetics healthy subjects.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dosed tolerability, pharmacokinetic study of a single-dose/multiple-doses incremental intravenous injection of SY-005 in healthy subjects. Six sigle-dose group trials are planned: 0.75mg, 2.5mg, 5mg, 10mg, 15mg,and 20mg and three multiple-doses groups are planned: 5mg, 10mg and 20mg. Single-dose groups are planned to enroll 64 subjects and multiple-doses groups are planned to enroll 30 subjects.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence of adverse events of SY-005
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of adverse events of SY-005, collecting number of subjects with adverse events as assessed by CTCAE V5.0. Number of subjects with adverse events, major adverse events, serious adverse events, pregnancy events, abnormal laboratory values, abnormal vital signs, abnormal physical examination, abnormal ECG data.

secondary_outcome.measure: Area under curve (AUC) of SY-005 following injection of single dose/multiple-doses
secondary_outcome.description: To mearsure the study drug concentration in blood samples which collected after injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of SY-005 following injection of single dose/multiple-doses
secondary_outcome.description: To mearsure the study drug concentration in blood samples which collected after injection

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of SY-005 following injection of single dose
secondary_outcome.description: To mearsure the study drug concentration in blood samples which collected after injection

secondary_outcome.measure: T1/2 of SY-005 following injection of single dose
secondary_outcome.description: To mearsure the study drug concentration in blood samples which collected after injection

arm_group.description: 4 subjects will be envolved in this group and be injected with 0.75mg of SY-005.
This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 2.5mg dose. 12 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 5:1.
This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 5mg dose. 12 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 5:1.
This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 10mg dose. 12 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 5:1.
This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 15mg dose. 12 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 5:1.
This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 20mg dose. 12 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 5:1.

This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 5mg dose. 10 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 4:1. The subjects will be injected with SY-005 or placebo for 7days.

This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 10mg dose. 10 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 4:1. The subjects will be injected with SY-005 or placebo for 7days.

This group will be intiated in healthy subjects at a 20mg dose. 10 subjects will be envolved in this group and the proportion of subjects injected SY-005 to placebo is 4:1. The subjects will be injected with SY-005 or placebo for 7days.

intervention.description: This single-dose group will be initiated in healthy subjects at a 0.75mg dose that is the maximum recommended starting dose(MRSD). Doses will be escalated in subsequent dosing process, after appropriate review of safety data. The subsequent planned doses are2.5mg, 5mg, 10mg, 15mg, 20mg successively. The dose of multiple-doses groups are depending on the results of single-dose groups.
